resources.string: Before you can use this application with a remote device, you need to pair the devices via Bluetooth.

If the devices are already paired, they must be paired again so that the remote device is aware of the new capabilities. In this case please remove this Bluetooth device on the remote device before proceeding.
The device is now visible. Please search on the remote device for a Bluetooth device with the name “%1$s” and pair it.
Please confirm any Bluetooth pairing request notification and press connect when the remote device is ready.
Warning: Another Bluetooth input service is active on this device. This is problematic if you want to pair with an iOS or Windows device.

You might get an “Connection refused” error on connect because iOS has already established a connection and blocks other connection attempts. To fix this close the Bluetooth connection on the iOS device (turn Bluetooth off and on again) and reconnect from BlueCtrl.

Sorry, but you are unable to use this application with a Microsoft Windows device if another Bluetooth input service is active. You can try to pair the devices but you will receive an authorization error on connect even if Windows reports that the device has been successfully added.
Try to pair the devices again.
Make sure you are in range and Bluetooth is active.
The remote device is busy or the devices aren’t correctly paired.
A Bluetooth input device emulator that can control remote devices.
The application encountered a problem and cannot continue (Error %1$d).
